replies.body:
You can look around, how many GD'ers are actually left?

We get some new GD'ers here but really most of the people who are using Board atm are silent upvote/downvote lurkers.
Tbh if they just brought back the old forums, that'd be great.{{champion:98}}
That would be great, but it's not going to happen. Since when does Riot pay any mind to feedback?

NA has a [GD](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD), and lots of OCE, EUW, and EUNE people post there too.

I do think it's neat that Riot made it possible for cross-country accounts to post in other regions, but it also kind of confuses me as to why they are splitting the Boards up into separate regions when everyone could just stick together in one Board as a big happy family.
Misc is pretty much everything in one. So people can actually be more off topic than normal in Misc than was allowed in GD.
Yeah most of GD has/is leaving but some will remain

> Yeah most of GD has/is leaving but some will remain

To be honest if they changed the layout and terrible color i along with many others would stay, right now it looks awful, also change miscellaneous to GD.

I like these icons tho :3
{{champion:107}} {{item:3171}}
If rito oce put a GD topic in boards thatd be great since misc is basically off topic renamed
But GD is also off-topic renamed...
I'm not going to post as often not because of boards, but because of WoW.
I've been using misc like it is GD, but yes, this is lacking GDers.
